meanings.definition: A game in which players try to throw rings onto a target.
meanings.sent1: During the carnival, children enjoyed playing ringtosses to win prizes.
meanings.sent2: At the fair, there was a booth where people could try their hand at ringtosses.
meanings.sent3: The ringtosses game at the party was so popular that even the adults joined in the fun.
meanings.sent4: Her accuracy in the ringtosses game was like a sharpshooter hitting the bullseye every time.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rings landing on the target in the ringtosses game echoed through the park.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing rings onto a target.
meanings.sent1: His ringtosses were so precise that he never missed the target.
meanings.sent2: The ringtosses at the event were a test of skill and aim.
meanings.sent3: She practiced her ringtosses in the backyard, aiming for the tree as the target.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of the ringtosses hitting the target was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The ringtosses competition brought out the competitive spirit in all the participants.
